title: OGDCL optimizes Oil production at Rajian oil field
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 16 (APP): Oil & Gas Development Company Limited, (OGDCL) has successfully revived a heavy oil well in the Rajian Oil Field, Chakwal, increasing production from 1,500 to 2,500 barrels per day (BPD).
According to news release, this achievement is part of OGDCL’s strategic efforts to boost energy production.
Using innovative technologies like Electrical Submersible Pumps (ESP), the Rajian-3A well, suspended since 2020, has been revived to produce 1,000 BPD.
With 10 more wells under revival, OGDCL’s optimization plan, including work overs and advanced artificial lift systems, will enhance Pakistan’s energy production.
Rig N-4 is actively supporting these operations, ensuring maximum efficiency. This achievement highlights OGDCL’s commitment to sustainable energy development, operational excellence and strengthening Pakistan’s energy security.
